name: Don't Worry, I Saved You
description:
Play against a friend in a fast match game of who will die first. That's right, you have to die before him, or save him either healing or giving him shields. Use your hook to take him out of dangerous harms.

This is a game I made for the #365IndiesJam2017 using the Godot Engine in one and a half day. The theme of the Jam was Death is usefull.

Hope you like it :)

Please support if you want updates and more games :D
